prompt: HELP! The building is on fire, my babies are inside the room but it is locked!
There is someone in my house. I can hear footsteps downstairs, and I am hiding in the closet!
I have been in a car accident. My chest hurts, and I cannot feel my legs. Please send help!
I am having a heart attack! My chest feels like it is being crushed, and I am sweating heavily!
There is a man with a gun in the park! He is pointing it at people and shouting!
My neighbor is screaming for help. I think they are being attacked!
I can smell gas in my house, and I feel lightheaded! I am scared it might explode!
My child is not breathing! I do not know what to do!
There is a fire in my kitchen! I cannot put it out!
I am trapped in an elevator, and I am claustrophobic! Please help me!
I have fallen down the stairs, and I cannot move my leg!
There is a strange man following me, and I am scared!
